Label: Room2
Description: You're in a dank room with a big door to the north. There is a massive lock on it. In the corner there is a small stream and a frog sitting there.

UniqueActions.Text: The stream is definitely made of water. Nice detective work!
You've already lost a limb to this thing. You think it might be better to not tempt fate.

You try to get the stream, but the stream gets you instead!
Something in the stream has eaten one of your limbs.
You struggle with the door, but it won't budge. Seems like it'll need unlocked first.
You try to unlock the door again. It's already unlocked. Still feels good and powerful, however.
You place the key into the lock of the giant door and twist. It clicks! The door has been unlocked successfully!

The frog eats the taco with glee in a single giant bite. 'My god,' the frog says, 'it had been so long...'
'As promised, I will now grant you unlimited power.'
The frog twiddles his fingers in the air for a moment, then pulls a gun out of a bag and gives it to you.
You swing the door open on its hinges now that it has been unlocked. Technology is neat. You can walk through to the north whenever you're ready.
You struggle with the door, but it won't budge. Seems like it'll need unlocked first.
It's a big sturdy door made of wood. It also a cartoonishly large lock on it with an equally cartoony large keyhole.
The lock is huge and sturdy. You're going to need something to unlock it.
You shoot the frog again. He is now... deader? You're making it weird.
You shoot the frog. He is now dead. He probably should have expected this.
The frog says '...' because you killed it, you monster.
The frog says 'Nothing more powerful than a gun! Pew pew!'
The frog says 'Got that taco yet? Sure could USE me a TACO, chum!'
The frog says 'Man, I could really go for a taco. If you bring me a taco, I will grant you unlimited power.'
